sentence.Network_en: Single core cable shall be installed in either trefoil or flat formation and secured using cleats.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French trifoil, from Latin trifolium, from tri- 'three' + folium 'leaf'

means.word_mean: 1. any of several Old World herbs of the genus Medicago having small flowers and trifoliate compound leaves
2. a plant of the genus Trifolium
3. an architectural ornament in the form of three arcs arranged in a circle
